title: Antibacterial efficacy of low-dosage silver nanoparticle–sodium alginate–chitosan nanocomposite films against pure and clinical acne strains
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33267-33280
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05180G, Paper
Open Access

Bao Lam Thai Tran, Thanh Van Vo, Teng-Ping Chu, Duong Thai Bach, Thai Quang Nguyen, Phuong Hong Bao Luu, Vy Thi Thuy Tran, Hieu Hoang Duong, Nhi Hoang Nguyen, Gai Thi Le, Thu Thi Tran, Khanh Nguyen Tuong Tran, Le Thi Cam Tuyen, Truong Ngoc Dinh, Ngo Ngoc Uyen, Tram Thi Thu Nguyen, Ngoc-Van Thi Nguyen, Kien Trung Nguyen, Le Thi Nhu Tran, Phuoc Huu Le
Collection of clinical acne samples, synthesis, and evaluation of the antibacterial activity of silver nanoparticles–chitosan (AgNPs–Chi) solution and silver nanoparticles–sodium alginate–chitosan (AgNPs–Alg–Chi) nanocomposite film against various pure and clinically relevant bacterial strains.
